subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If 20-year-old Rick Porcello, who pitched two and a third innings in the Tigers’ 4-3 loss to the Yankees, makes it to the majors, he will have a few lessons to learn.
snippet: If 20-year-old Rick Porcello, who pitched two and a third innings in the Tigers’ 4-3 loss to the Yankees, makes it to the majors, he will have a few lessons to learn.
